style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 15.45%;top: 4.01%;width: 9.79%;height: 6.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 24.88%;top: 7.45%;width: 7.28%;height: 6.37%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
今までで
最高の
誕生日よ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 57.82%;top: 4.18%;width: 11.69%;height: 7.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
見事に
謎を解いた
わね!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.75%;top: 36.79%;width: 12.89%;height: 8.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
凄いって
言った
でしょ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37.77%;top: 37.12%;width: 9.67%;height: 5.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
「リンゴの仇は
必ず討つ!」って
いい台詞だったよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56.74%;top: 36.70%;width: 15.63%;height: 7.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
絶対
そんなこと
言ってねぇ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 53.16%;top: 53.22%;width: 11.93%;height: 5.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
リンゴと
恋に落ちても
しょうがないわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.13%;top: 59.50%;width: 13.48%;height: 6.79%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
彼の頭は
君にウィンクして
キス顔してたから
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.05%;top: 65.71%;width: 15.63%;height: 7.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
そんなこと
してたの
かよ?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 23.57%;top: 61.60%;width: 9.79%;height: 7.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.96%;top: 61.18%;width: 9.55%;height: 3.35%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
頭が
２つある?
新しく
生えた?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37.17%;top: 63.86%;width: 13.01%;height: 8.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
僕は
マンドラゴラ
持ってる頭は
僕の果物さ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.55%;top: 61.68%;width: 12.77%;height: 8.13%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;

text:
これは初めて
落とした実で
特別なんだ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 78.46%;top: 83.73%;width: 12.77%;height: 10.06%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 44%;font-weight: normal;
